introduction.quote: Captain of the Crux, with quite the reputation in Liyue.There are those who say she can split mountains and part the sea. Others say she draws lightning through her sword. Some say that even the mightiest of sea beasts are no match for her.For those not from Liyue, it may sound like a hearty joke, but those that have sailed with her will say—"No matter what sea beasts there may be, Beidou will be sure to split them all in two."
introduction.content: Beidou ( Chinese: 北斗 Běidǒu, "Big Dipper" ) is a playable Electro  character in Genshin Impact. She is the captain of The Crux, a renowned crew in Liyue. Besides her capabilities as a fleet captain and her immense strength, many in Liyue know her for her lack of fear towards the Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, Ningguang — a trait that the other woman appreciates, yet grows irritated by.

personality.quote: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.
content:
Beidou loves travelling the oceans, setting sail with her ship and crew to any place they desire. She admits that she is so used to sailing the seas that she is not used to staying on land for prolonged periods of time.
She is a reliable and strong captain, getting along well with her entire crew, prioritizing the interests of her ship and crew first above everything else. In part due to her time in the seas, she can easily read people in an instant and shows no fear against powerful entities, having defeated the leviathan Haishan without a vision, something that Xiao notes as remarkable. She often breaks the rules in Liyue, resulting in hefty fines from the Tianquan, but she does not appear to mind paying despite having lost a significant amount of Mora doing so.
Beidou is also on good terms with Ganyu, but because of her poor standing with the Liyue Qixing, she keeps it a secret to avoid putting a negative light on her.
She enjoys eating robust food, primarily those fried or spiced, and enjoys drinking. Due to this, she is fond of Xiangling's cooking and does not mind testing out any new dishes for her when she returns to port.

appearance:
Beidou is a tall woman whose beauty strikes one senseless, like a flash of roaring thunder. She has long, waist-length dark brown hair that flows like the waves of the sea. The top of her hair is tied up with an intricate gold hairpin with a pale blue tassel hanging from one end. Her fringe parts around her right eye, slightly covering her left. Her right eye is a deep ruby-colored hue melting into gold, reminiscent of a brilliant dawn. The radiance in her gaze could challenge that of the sun. Her left eye is covered by a red eyepatch. From her left ear dangles an earring resembling two hollow diamonds stacked upon each other, the color of which matches with her hairpin.
Her outfit, Rolling Waves, is described to be lightweight clothing saturated with a brave seafarer's spirit.
She dons a black leotard underneath a bright red sleeveless qipao dress, with side slits going up to her hips and the chest area cut out. In stark contrast to the rest of her primarily red ensemble, a vivid purple Electro Vision is chained below her left breast, from which hangs a golden tassel. Beidou also wears an imposing fur-lined red shawl around her shoulders. The back of her qipao dress splits into two, with gold cloud patterns embroidered at the end, accentuated by black bordering. Additionally, she wears a pair of fingerless, elbow-length black gloves. Beidou's boots reach up to her thighs and boast high heels strong enough to kick a claymore into the air with. Many golden anchor motifs can be found scattered around Beidou's outfit, such as on her boots, her gloves, and the front of her qipao dress.

talents.name: Oceanborne
talents.desc:
Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 successive strikes.
Charged Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Tidecaller
talents.desc:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.
Press: Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.
Hold: Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.The shield possesses the following properties:

Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
Applies the Electro Element to Beidou upon activation.

talents.name: Stormbreaker
talents.desc:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents.
Thunderbeast's Targe:

When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.
Triggers a maximum of 1 lightning discharge per second.

talents.name: Retribution
talents.desc: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

talents.name: Lightning Storm
talents.desc:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

talents.name: Conqueror of Tides
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellation.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellation.effect: When Stormbreaker is used:Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellation.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellation.effect: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellation.name: Summoner of Storm
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Stunning Revenge
constellation.effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

constellation.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Bane of Evil
constellation.effect: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
